title: NVIDIA GTC 2026
description: The premier global AI conference bringing developers, researchers, and business leaders together to explore breakthroughs in physical AI, agentic AI, inference, and AI factories.
overview: NVIDIA GTC is the ultimate destination for AI innovation, featuring CEO Jensen Huang's keynote at SAP Center, over 500 technical sessions, hands-on training labs, and networking with experts across the AI ecosystem. Experience the latest in accelerated computing and AI technologies that are transforming every industry.
audience: Developers, Researchers, Business Leaders, IT Professionals, AI Practitioners
agenda: Day 1: Keynote by Jensen Huang at SAP Center, GTC Live Pregame Show
Sessions covering physical AI, AI factories, agentic AI, and inference
Hands-on workshops and training labs with NVIDIA experts
70+ training lab sessions for advanced skill development
Exhibits showcasing latest NVIDIA technologies and partner solutions
Networking receptions and industry meetups

title: RSA Conference 2026
description: The world's leading cybersecurity conference bringing together security professionals, researchers, and industry leaders to discuss the latest trends in cryptography, cyber defense, and risk management.
overview: RSAC 2026 focuses on the Power of Community, uniting cybersecurity professionals for four days of strategies, partnerships, and market-defining ideas. With over 45,000 attendees including 44% directors, C-level executives, and VPs, the conference offers unmatched depth across cloud transformation, Zero Trust, AI security, and identity management.
audience: Cybersecurity Professionals, CISOs, Security Researchers, IT Leaders, Executives
agenda: Welcome Reception showcasing information security solutions
Innovation Sandbox competition featuring top 10 innovative startups
Technical sessions on Application Security and Cloud Security
Tracks on Identity and Access Management, Threat Intelligence
Data Protection, GRC, and Compliance deep dives
Emerging Technologies and Evolving Threat Landscape sessions

title: Google Cloud Next 2026
description: Google's flagship cloud and AI conference featuring three days of lightning talks, interactive demos, guided workshops, and powerful networking opportunities with industry leaders.
overview: Google Cloud Next 2026 returns to Las Vegas with a focus on Agentic Systems and practical AI implementation. Explore breakthroughs in cloud computing, data analytics, and AI agents that execute complex workflows. With over 30,000 attendees, the conference offers hands-on learning, product announcements, and direct access to Google experts.
audience: Cloud Architects, Developers, Data Scientists, IT Decision Makers, Business Leaders
agenda: Opening keynotes from Google Cloud leadership with major announcements
Spotlight sessions showcasing innovations, demos, and customer success stories
Interactive 45-minute Developer Sandbox workshops
Google Cloud Showcase with real-world customer stories on Expo floor
Industry-specific networking sessions and community meetups
Partner Summit programming (April 21-24)

title: Dell Technologies World 2026
description: Dell's premier event featuring breaking technology announcements, visionary keynotes, hands-on learning, and unlimited networking opportunities for IT and business leaders.
overview: Dell Technologies World 2026 brings together customers and partners for four days of innovation, focusing on AI-ready infrastructure, modern data centers, and secure AI PCs. Explore smart, flexible, and resilient technologies for storage, servers, multicloud, and edge computing that accelerate digital transformation.
audience: IT Professionals, CIOs, Technology Partners, Business Leaders, Data Center Managers
agenda: Monday morning kickoff with visionary keynotes
Modern Data Center track: AI-ready infrastructure and data protection
Modern Workplace sessions on AI PCs and workplace technologies
Partner-specific sessions and leadership team meetings
Technical breakout sessions and hands-on labs
The Experience evening celebration on Wednesday

title: Cisco Live 2026
description: The ultimate destination for IT practitioners featuring cutting-edge technical education, hands-on training, networking innovation, and powerful collaboration opportunities.
overview: For over 36 years, Cisco Live has been bringing together the brightest minds in networking and IT. Cisco Live 2026 offers comprehensive training on CUDA, certification opportunities, and insights from Cisco's Executive Leadership Team. Connect with experts to tackle tech challenges and explore the future of AI, security, and networking.
audience: Network Engineers, IT Practitioners, Security Professionals, Cloud Architects, Technology Leaders
agenda: Sunday Technical Seminars (4-hour intensive sessions)
Monday-Thursday breakout sessions and instructor-led labs
Keynotes from Cisco executives and technology trailblazers
World of Solutions expo with partner demonstrations
Free certification exam opportunities for Full Conference pass holders
Wednesday evening Cisco Live Celebration and networking events

title: Black Hat USA 2026
description: One of the world's most respected information security conferences bringing together cybersecurity professionals, hackers, executives, and security researchers for cutting-edge research and disclosures.
overview: Black Hat USA 2026 features a comprehensive 6-day program with specialized training courses and a two-day main conference. Founded in 1997, Black Hat showcases over 100 selected briefings, Arsenal tool demonstrations, and extensive networking. The event influences the broader cybersecurity industry through groundbreaking security research and vulnerability disclosures.
audience: Security Researchers, Ethical Hackers, CISOs, Cybersecurity Professionals, Executives
agenda: August 1-4: Black Hat Trainings - intensive cybersecurity workshops
Black Hat Summits for top-level executives (approval-only)
August 5-6: Black Hat Briefings with keynotes and technical sessions
Arsenal: Open-source security tool demonstrations
Business Hall with vendor exhibits and networking
Panel discussions led by cybersecurity experts

title: Ai4 2026
description: America's largest AI conference convening the most influential minds in artificial intelligence to explore real-world applications, breakthrough advancements, and proven best practices.
overview: Ai4 2026 brings together 12,000 attendees, 1,000 speakers, and 400 exhibitors across nearly 1 million square feet at The Venetian Las Vegas. The three-day conference features 20+ industry tracks covering AI agents, generative AI, world models, and practical deployments across healthcare, finance, retail, manufacturing, and more. Experience keynotes from leading researchers, hands-on workshops, and powerful networking opportunities.
audience: AI Practitioners, Data Scientists, Business Executives, ML Engineers, Technology Leaders, Researchers
agenda: August 3: Pre-conference Training Workshops with General Assembly
August 4: Conference kickoff with AI fundamentals track
Keynotes exploring AI agents, generative AI, and world models
20+ industry tracks covering finance, healthcare, cybersecurity, retail
Daily exhibit floor happy hours with signature cocktails
Women in AI Reception and Ai4 Executive Summit
August 6: Official Afterparty with live music and Vegas energy
